Episodes.Title: The Heirs of the Dragon
Episodes.Writer: Ryan J. Condal, George R.R. Martin, Charmaine De Grate
Episodes.Actors: Paddy Considine, Matt Smith, Emma D'Arcy
Episodes.Plot: Viserys hosts a tournament to celebrate the birth of his second child. Rhaenyra welcomes her uncle Daemon back to the Red Keep.

Episodes.Title: The Rogue Prince
Episodes.Writer: George R.R. Martin, Ryan J. Condal, Charmaine De Grate
Episodes.Actors: Paddy Considine, Matt Smith, Rhys Ifans
Episodes.Plot: Rhaenyra oversteps at the Small Council. Viserys is urged to secure the succession through marriage. Daemon announces his intentions.

Episodes.Title: King of the Narrow Sea
Episodes.Writer: George R.R. Martin, Ryan J. Condal, Ira Parker
Episodes.Actors: Paddy Considine, Matt Smith, Rhys Ifans
Episodes.Plot: Rhaenyra continues her search for a suitable match, Daemon returns to Kings Landing and stirs more trouble for the King. Rhaenyra learns a valuable lesson.

Episodes.Title: We Light the Way
Episodes.Writer: George R.R. Martin, Ryan J. Condal, Charmaine De Grate
Episodes.Actors: Paddy Considine, Matt Smith, Rhys Ifans
Episodes.Plot: Daemon visits his wife in the Vale. Viserys and Rhaenyra broker agreements with the Velaryons. Alicent seeks the truth about the princess.

Episodes.Title: The Princess and the Queen
Episodes.Writer: George R.R. Martin, Ryan J. Condal, Sara Hess
Episodes.Actors: Paddy Considine, Matt Smith, Olivia Cooke
Episodes.Plot: Ten years later. Rhaenyra navigates Alicent's continued speculation about her children, while Daemon and Laena weigh an offer in Pentos.

Episodes.Title: Driftmark
Episodes.Writer: George R.R. Martin, Ryan J. Condal, Kevin Lau
Episodes.Actors: Paddy Considine, Matt Smith, Olivia Cooke
Episodes.Plot: As the families gather on Driftmark for a funeral, Viserys calls for an end to infighting and Alicent demands justice.

Episodes.Title: The Lord of the Tides
Episodes.Writer: George R.R. Martin, Ryan J. Condal, Eileen Shim
Episodes.Actors: Paddy Considine, Matt Smith, Olivia Cooke
Episodes.Plot: Six years later. With the Driftmark succession suddenly critical, Rhaenyra attempts to strike a bargain with Rhaenys.

Episodes.Title: The Green Council
Episodes.Writer: George R.R. Martin, Ryan J. Condal, Sara Hess
Episodes.Actors: Paddy Considine, Olivia Cooke, Rhys Ifans
Episodes.Plot: While Alicent enlists Cole and Aemond to track down Aegon, Otto gathers the great houses of Westeros to affirm their allegiance.

Episodes.Title: The Black Queen
Episodes.Writer: George R.R. Martin, Ryan J. Condal, Charmaine De Grate
Episodes.Actors: Matt Smith, Emma D'Arcy, Rhys Ifans
Episodes.Plot: While mourning a tragic loss, Rhaenyra tries to hold the realm together, and Daemon prepares for war.
